scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch-less" "npm run serve" "npm run watch-reload"
scripts.watch-reload: nodemon --watch dist/css --watch pages --watch modules --ext css,html,js --exec "echo 'Files changed - refresh your browser'"
scripts.build: npm run build-less && npm run build-less-compressed
scripts.test-change: npm run build-less && echo 'âœ… LESS compiled! Check your browser - it should auto-refresh.'
